stuffing the head and body make it firm but not so firm the stitches stretch out don t bind off yet look closely at your shark from the front and determine which direction is up your seam may not run straight underneath the shark mine never do but it should be underneath the front of the face once you have that determined flatten out the back vertically or up and down the tail will go up and down later on once you have figured out which side is up you should have 4 single_crochet stitches 8 divided in half you can crochet through crochet through each of these to close up the body see pictures below bind off but leave a long tail so you can sew the shark s tail on later don t weave in the ends page 3 of 9 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush
